velinov.java.jfreechart.realtime

Interface RealTimePlot

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Chart, EventDispatchable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsRealTimePlot, VREPRealTimePlot

    public interface RealTimePlot
extends Chart
    Describes a real-time plotting chart.
    Since:
    11.04.2015
    Author:
    Vladimir Velinov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_ADDED_VARIABLE
      a property that is fired whenever a new variable to be displayed is added to the plot.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_VARIABLES_UPDATED
      a property that is fired whenever the values of all variables have been updated - RealTimePlot#updateRealTimeVariables(float[]) have been invoked.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Add a variable to be displayed on the real-time graph.
      org.jfree.data.Range getRange() 
      int getVariablesCount() 
      void setRange(float _min, float _max)
      Set the minimum and maximum values of the range axis.
      void updateRealTimeVariables(float[] _values)
      Update the values of the real-time graph.

      • Methods inherited from interface velinov.java.jfreechart.Chart

        getDataSet, getPanel, getPlot, setBackGroundColor

      • Methods inherited from interface velinov.java.event.EventDispatchable

        addPropertyChangeListener, addPropertyChangeListener, addPropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener, removePropertyChangeListener

    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_ADDED_VARIABLE

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_ADDED_VARIABLE
        a property that is fired whenever a new variable to be displayed is added to the plot.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_VARIABLES_UPDATED

        static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_VARIABLES_UPDATED
        a property that is fired whenever the values of all variables have been updated - RealTimePlot#updateRealTimeVariables(float[]) have been invoked.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • updateRealTimeVariables

        void updateRealTimeVariables(float[] _values)
        Update the values of the real-time graph. The method invokes SwingUtilities#invokeLater() and is thus Swing thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        _values -

      • addRealTimeVariable

        void addRealTimeVariable(RealTimeVariable _variable)
        Add a variable to be displayed on the real-time graph. The event trigers a PROPERTY_ADDED_VARIABLE property change.
        Parameters:
        _variable - to be plotted.

      • getVariablesCount

        int getVariablesCount()
        Returns:
        the numbers of real-time variables which are currently displayed.

      • setRange

        void setRange(float _min,
              float _max)
        Set the minimum and maximum values of the range axis.
        Parameters:
        _min - the minimum displayable value.
        _max - the maximum displayable value.

      • getRange

        org.jfree.data.Range getRange()
        Returns:
        the range of the range axis.
